name: 3 Scary Games
description:
You’ve been abducted and wake up in a man’s basement. He tells you that he will kill you at midnight. A clock on the wall tells you that its 6pm. You have time find a way out, but this Man knows what he is doing. You’ll need to learn from your mistakes, because he learns from his. Use items and unlock doors, all while avoiding the Man who adapts to your tactics.

The Man

The man will adapt when you evade him, making you unable to use the same tactic twice.



Use whatever you can in the house, including the houses vents. But don't rely on them, the Man may be able to trap you..

Time

You must escape before midnight. The only way to tell time is by looking at the clocks in his house. Every time you are knocked out, you are unconscious for 2 hours. If you wake up past midnight: it’s game over.




You don’t know where you are, how you got here, and what it going on. The only thing you know is that your daughter is in trouble. You need to find her, but you don’t know how to do that either. Uncover the mystery and reclaim reality.

Puzzles

Solve mind-bending puzzles in order to progress through this psychological horror experience.

Mystery

Something is going on, solve the puzzles to find out.


You stumble upon an abandoned sewer treatment plant. You were just parkouring and looking for new territory, but you didn’t expect to find what was lurking underground. Now you’ll have to jump, swing, and climb to escape this monster.

Parkour

You'll need use your parkour skills to evade the monster, all while finding a way out. You'll need to get across one big gap by building a path.
